mapper.insert: insert into db_projectlog (SEQUENCEID, PROJECTID, OPERTYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, PROJECTNAME, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, CONTENT, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_projectlog set PROJECTID = #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECTNAME = #{projectname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PROJECTID, OPERTYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, PROJECTNAME, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, CONTENT, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from db_projectlog where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, PROJECTID, OPERTYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, PROJECTNAME, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, CONTENT, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from db_projectlog
